ValidationRule.description: If Iris sync is checked then user cannot edit the record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",$Profile.Name <>"Integration User"), Channel_Partner_From_CP_Portal__c = false, NOT(ISNEW()), RW_IRIS_Sync__c = true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Cannot edit record as Iris sync is checked.
